TextView.android:text:
*The user is presented with four levels of game difficulty, Novice, Easy, Medium, Guru.

 *The Novice level corresponds to an arithmetic expression involving exactly 2 integers.

 *Easy level corresponds to an arithmetic expression with maximum 3 terms. 
 
*The Medium level corresponds to an arithmetic expression with maximum 4 terms. 

 *The Guru level corresponds to an arithmetic expression with maximum 6 terms and minimum 4 terms. 

*User must enter the answer before the time runs out 

*Hint button will show user 4 hints, if user fails to give answer it will redirect to next question
